articles.title: China: Chang’e 5 lunar probe discovers first on-site evidence of water on moon - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: For the first time, a lunar lander technology evaluated the spectral reflectance of regolith and rock and discovered water on the spot.
articles.content: For the first time, a lunar lander technology evaluated the spectral reflectance of regolith and rock and discovered water on the spot.The first-ever on-site evidence of water on the moon's surface w… [+1886 chars]

articles.title: Sri Lanka's president asks China to restructure debt repayments - Reuters
articles.description: Sri Lanka's President Gotabaya Rajapaksa asked China to help restructure debt repayments as part of efforts to help the South Asian country weather a worsening financial crisis, his office said in a statement on Sunday.
articles.content: COLOMBO, Jan 10 (Reuters) - Sri Lanka's President Gotabaya Rajapaksa asked China to help restructure debt repayments as part of efforts to help the South Asian country weather a worsening financial c… [+2889 chars]

articles.title: Man attacks son with knife during argument in Serangoon flat - AsiaOne
